Address.label: Address
Address.value: 9924 WEST 74TH STREET, EDEN PRAIRIE, Minnesota, 55344, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Surmodics Inc is a provider of surface modification and in vitro diagnostic technologies to the healthcare industry. The company's mission is to improve the treatment and detection of disease by using our technology to provide solutions to difficult medical devices and diagnostic challenges. It has two reportable segments: Medical device unit and the Vitro diagnostics unit. Surmodics derives most of its revenue from the Vitro diagnostics segment.
